fixes.name: Date Filter
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR useCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR startDate = SELECTEDVALUE('Start Date'[Display As])
VAR endDate = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    useCustom,
    IF(
        OR(
            'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Max Date Exclude] = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE],
            'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[MAX_DATE -1day] = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE]
        ),
        1,
        0
    ),
    IF(
        OR(
            'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE] = startDate,
            'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE] = endDate
        ),
        1,
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the nested Tableau IF logic to DAX using VARs for parameter values (SELECTEDVALUE for each parameter) and IF/OR for conditional checks. All field references were transformed to 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[ColumnName] format to match Power BI syntax.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references Tableau parameters ([Parameters]), and per rules all parameter-based calculations must be created as measures.
